summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHourglass Phantom Volumizing Glossy Balm is an innovative all-in-one lip gloss-balm that nourishes, hydrates, and plumps lips while delivering full-bodied color with a dewy, high-shine finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating, smoothing, and softeningDelivers high-shine color that melts onto lipsVisibly plumps lipsProvides a refreshing cooling sensationVegan and cruelty-free2023 Allure Best of Beauty WinnerKey IngredientsMenthyl Lactate: Provides an instant cooling sensationConditioning Complex: A blend of emollients and oils that nourishes, conditions, and hydrates lipsFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensPhthalatesSynthetic FragranceSulfatesTalcItem 2595487How To UseTwist base slightly‚ÄØto dispense desired amount. Pen does not retract.‚ÄØFor more‚ÄØintense color, apply a second layer.‚ÄØIngredientsLucid 155: Diisostearyl Malate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ceresin, Menthyl Lactate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410).*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Twist base slightly‚ÄØto dispense desired amount. Pen does not retract.‚ÄØFor more‚ÄØintense color, apply a second layer.

reviews.headline: IT DOES NOT RETRACT
reviews.comments: for a product branded and priced at luxury levels, the dispensing mechanism is so juvenile and cheap. I turned it just a little to see how much i had left AND IT DOESNT RETRACT SO IT CANT GO BACK IN. disappointing

reviews.headline: More gloss than lip color
reviews.comments: Very nice!   Feels great on the lips and lasts for hours.  Very subtle color.  Will use with lipstick for my distinct color.

reviews.headline: So pretty
reviews.comments: I do love this product and color.  I wish it was not so melty, especially in the summer, but there's no denying the quality.  I also like the super subtle minty zing.

reviews.headline: Love hate relationship
reviews.comments: I love this lip gloss but PLEASE DOUBLE THE AMOUNT OUT IN THE TUBE, HOURGLASS! It doesnt last very long on your lips. If youre like me and try to keep it fresh looking throughout your event, it does NOT last long. The tube has never lasted me more than a couple weeks. But the color and feel cant be beat.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Worth the price. Very pretty finish. Feels so nice on the lips

reviews.headline: A Holy Grail Product
reviews.comments: I'm not much of a lip product person, so this gloss has been such a pleasant surprise! It's not sticky and the color saturation is much higher than I expected from a gloss. The real magic, though, is how luxuriously hydrated and plumped this makes my lips feel! I have notoriously dry lips, but since I've been using this, they feel like silk! I have Desire, but I'm going to pick up one of the reds, too. Expensive, but worth it! This is my first holy grail product!

reviews.headline: Can't see it üòï
reviews.comments: I really love the balm itself. I have it in another shade and use it daily. This one, I was hoping to love as well but it's just not visible on me.

reviews.headline: Very moisturizing and long lasting!
reviews.comments: I love this product! It lasts long, and feels so moisturizing. The only thing I didn't like, is that the colors are much different than they show on the packages. I wish there were more colors!

reviews.headline: Not red enough but enough red to glow
reviews.comments: love the coloring, it has a red tint but it does not skin enough to be called red lipstick. Love the application and you do not need that much.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love it.
reviews.comments: I love this so much. It feels good. Looks good and I never want to be without it.

reviews.headline: Red 0 is a sheer pinkish red
reviews.comments: I'm a sucker for red lipstick. Red 0 is a sheer pinkish red that can be built up to a beautiful bold red. I recommend using a red lip liner to line snd fill in lips first because it's hard to make a clean outline with a sheer balm. It has a minty sensation, but I don't think it actually plumps.

reviews.headline: I love this lippie!
reviews.comments: I absolutely adore this lippie it's so glossy and the pigment is so natural but opaque! I love throwing her on for a long lasting natural lip look for every day wear! I can't recommend her enough! Absolutely love this lippie! gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love the color, love the feel!

reviews.headline: Disappointing longevity
reviews.comments: I thought these were gorgeous but now finding not much longevity.  Getting a metallic taste/smell.

reviews.headline: Disappointing longevity
reviews.comments: I thought these were gorgeous but now finding not much longevity.  Getting a metallic taste/smell.

reviews.headline: Favorite gloss
reviews.comments: A truly beautiful gloss! Stunning color with a subtle plumping effect that provides shine and moisture for hours. Love this!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I love the phantom glossy balm by hourglass cosmetics! I have the shade crave which is a pinky peach shade and it is absolutely flattering on my fair skin tone! Makes my lips look glossy and plump all day long! Gifted by hourglass cosmetics

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: First off, the pigment is amazing! You do need to click it to get the product out, so be careful. It applies smoothly and effortlessly, with an incredible formula. The color is highly pigmented and lasts for a long time. Most importantly, it keeps your lips moisturized! Highly recommend! Gifted by Hourglass cosmetics.

reviews.headline: The perfect shade
reviews.comments: This was gifted by hourglass. I'm in love with this lip shade Entice. It's a berry color and it's perfect. I also love how it feels on my lips. It just melts so nicely. I would definitely recommend it. I think you'd love it.

reviews.headline: PERFECT rosewood gloss
reviews.comments: GORGEOUS color. I always lean more toward "rosewood" shades rather than pure true reds. This is THE most perfect "your lips but better" shade I've ever used. It has a slight tingly feeling when applied but it is not uncomfortably sticky. Super comfortable to wear and absolutely perfect with or without a lip liner, but I recommend a lip liner for that super full look. I gifted by Hourglass Cosmetics in exchange for an honest review but I would def repurchase on my own!

media.headline: I was blown when I tried this!
I was blown when I tried this!
I NEED THIS IN MORE SHADES NOW
Really nice wash of color . I like the shine and that it's e

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this Phantom Glossy Balm complimentary from hourglasscosmetics and it is even more wonderful than I could've imagined! I absolutely cannot get enough of Hourglass! The shade that I received is Trace which is a really pretty brownish color. The packaging is stunning as always. Phantom Glossy balm is a nourishing and hydrating lip balm that also plumps adding volume to your lips. I have super dry lips, and this bomb glides right onto my lips so beautifully! Leaving them hydrated, Northwest, shiny and plump, without any tingling. Trace is a beautiful brown color that looks really natural on my lips and has a gorgeous shine! My lips look shiny, dewy and just overall stunning. I definitely need more of the shades now!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love This Lippie!

faceoff_negative.comments: Gifted by Hourglass The Phantom Glossy Balm Refresh is formulated to hydrate, plump and deliver glossy shine. I love everything about this glossy balm except the tube. The formula is exactly what I want in a lip product. First, here's what I love. The glossy balm texture feels so creamy and soft. It leaves my lips feeling hydrated, smooth and soft. The color, Slip, is beautiful. It looks natural and somewhat sheer but completely buildable with additional layers. The color itself is very flattering by building on your natural lip color. What I don't love is the non-retractable tube. You have to be very careful when you twist the base to dispense the product. It does not retract. This doesn't make sense at all. You will always need to twist a little more than the metal tube so you can apply it , but what do you do when you finish applying if you can't retract it back? I made the mistake of twisting out too much, more that can fit below the cap. My husband thought he could fix this but instead he twisted out even more! So now, I leave my balm out without the cap, hoping the tube doesn't tip over. I think a better way to package this would be in a retractable tube or in a lip container with a lip brush. Without this issue, I'd give it a 5/5 for the color and formula but unfortunately, almost all lip products are retractable these days so if you don't realize this one does not retract, you will waste your purchase.
faceoff_negative.headline: Love the formula but not the tube
